ProcessTemplates.Name: Json file from SFTP server to MySQL Database UPDATE
ProcessTemplates.Description:
This process will retrieve a **Json file** from the specified **SFTP** server.
It will take the contents of the file and use it to  create an **MySQL Database** update statement. It will then execute the statement on the specified **MySQL Database**.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"FilePath":{"Value":"\"/frendstemplates/DGR-test/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Path to Json data input file."},"FileName":{"Value":"\"contact-upd.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of Json data input file."},"ServerAddress":{"Value":"\"20.240.5.82\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP Server Address."},"ServerUser":{"Value":"\"frendstemplates\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP Server User."},"ServerPassword":{"Value":"\"OinLoo6QEssEYzvqokPv6eJD8KUh2K4X\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP Server User's Password."},"TableName":{"Value":"\"Contact\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of table to be updated"},"MySQLConnectionString":{"Value":"\"Server=4.225.194.65;Database=template_development;User Id=root;Password=fhj18i(!/\\\"Hh93dJI!=;\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Connection string for MySQL database."}}

Process.Name: Json file from SFTP server to MySQL Database UPDATE
Process.Description:
This process will retrieve a **Json file** from the specified **SFTP** server.
It will take the contents of the file and use it to  create an **MySQL Database** update statement. It will then execute the statement on the specified **MySQL Database**.
